Name: Toy - Small Light Bridge
Description:
Summon a small light bridge above your head.
You can hop on and play freely across the Light Bridge.
Summoned toy lasts 30 minutes.
Description2$english:
Toy Usage Restrictions:
1. This is an obstruction-type toy. You can toggle whether you're affected by other players' obstruction toys in the Settings menu.
2. This toy cannot be used inside dungeons.
3. Toy summoning is limited per area. Try switching to another if you've reached the max.
4. Toy count is also limited near each character. Please summon in a more open area if needed.
